questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: Last year, I went in Italy with my school during 6 days. It was in April so it was warm and sunny every day. First, we went in Rome during 3 days. It's the most beautiful city that I have ever seen. We discovered a lot of monuments such as "Il colosseo", "Fontanta di Trevi",etc. Then, we went in Florence, another beautiful city ! We also visited a lot of things. Concerning the food, it was obviously delicious because in Italy, all is good ! This trip in Italy is my best momery of a holiday because I was with my friends and so it was very pleasant !
